tool.name: Load files from iRODS
tool.description: Load your files from iRODS into your Galaxy history
tool.command:
##------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Main body of the tool ##------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## First we process the current history and get a table with the metadata for each job #set global $history = $output.creating_job.history
## Set the params for the next Python script #set params={} ##1. File to upload #set params["file_path"] = str($filePath) ##2. Custom name #set params["custom_name"] = str($customName) ##3. Current Galaxy user #set params["user_name"] = str($__user_name__)
#if $user_option.typeUser=="use_custom_user" ##4. Custom user #set params["custom_user"] = str($user_option.custom_user) ##6. Custom pass #set params["custom_pass"] = str($user_option.custom_pass) #end if
##7. Galaxy params #set params["GALAXY_ROOT_DIR"] = str($GALAXY_ROOT_DIR) #set params["GALAXY_DATATYPES_CONF_FILE"] = str($GALAXY_DATATYPES_CONF_FILE) #set params["job_id"] = str($output.creating_job.id)
#import json #set $params=json.dumps($params)
##Execute the main tool script irods_pull.py '$params'

param.name: filePath
param.label: File to load (click here to select):

param.name: typeUser
param.label: Credentials for iRODS [see help for more information]:
param.option: Use my Galaxy username for iRODS.

tool.help:
Use this tool to load any number of files from your iRODS filesystem into the current Galaxy history. First choose the files in iRODS, set a custom name for the file in Galaxy (optional) and click on "Execute".
